# THIS FILE HAS BEEN GENERATED BY THE BUILD CONFIGURATION SYSTEM - DO NOT EDIT

set(MINECPP_UTIL_DIR ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR})

add_library(minecpp_utils STATIC)

# Public include headers
target_include_directories(minecpp_utils
  PUBLIC ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/include
  PRIVATE ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/include/minecpp/util
)

# Source subdirectory
add_subdirectory("src")

target_link_libraries(minecpp_utils
        LINK_PUBLIC
        libmb
        LINK_PRIVATE
        Boost::iostreams
        fmt::fmt
)

add_subdirectory("test")
